Tables

Easily create nicely looking tables, which come in different styles.

Usage

Open this example in a new window 

    <table class="c-table">
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>...</th>
          <th>...</th>
          ...
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td>...</td>
          <td>...</td>
          ...
        </tr>
        ...
      </tbody>
    </table>
